name: Anna Drinks a Lot of Milk
name_original: Anna Drinks a Lot of Milk
description:
Nurse Anna Ozimov's weird, surrogate pregnancy causes her some pretty strong cravings. Myra, who is a certified pregnant belly enjoyer, is here to help her out!

This is an 18+ kink game. All characters are 18 and older.

My Patreon supports the development of games like this one! Check that out at patreon.com/hexaltart

I highly recommend downloading the game; it runs considerably better outside of the browser.
